name: HYPERFIGHT
description:
Win by getting 5 points before your opponent. Each attack, if it lands, will instantly KO your opponent!

MECHANICS

MechanicDescriptionPointsGained by KO’ing your opponent, used for specials and supers. Shown at the top, get 5 to win the game.Normal AttackCosts nothing.Special AttackCosts 1 point, lost permanently if KO'd during the round. Invincible during the attack.Super AttackCosts 2 points, lost permanently if KO'd during the round. If this attack lands, you instantly win the game.DashingInvincible during the dash. Can dash horizontally on the ground and 4 way in the air (upwards dash will keep you in place).
